/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, lined with lush green trees and bushes, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on either side. A car is parked on the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise serene setting. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a bright and sunny day over the scene.
